Zinzy Waleson Geene

About

Heya, I'm Zinzy, and I've been yelling at Internet clouds since 1997. I'm a designer with 16 years of experience in product, service, and brand.

Specialized in making tools for people at work, I'm currently a Design Manager at Leeruniek, where we bring a data-driven approach to equitable education.

My biggest strength is also my biggest weakness — I see things and ask "Okay great, but why?" Welcome to my website, where I come to link and think. Learn more
